title: Explorer
description: Travels around discovering new trails and hidden treasures.

title: Storyteller
description: Shares exciting tales with friends by the campfire.

title: Inventor
description: Creates quirky gadgets from nuts, leaves, and twigs.

title: Fisher
description: Catches fish and teaches others how to fish in the icy waters.

title: Gardener
description: Tends to plants, flowers, and vegetables with care.

title: Juggler
description: Performs acrobatic tricks with bananas and coconuts.

title: Hunter
description: Keeps the balance in the savannah while protecting friends.

title: Shopkeeper
description: Runs the corner shop in Whisker Town, selling milk and yarn.

title: Teacher
description: Shares wisdom with younger critters under the moonlight.

title: Musician
description: Plays tunes on the guitar and cheers up the whole town.
